FROM ubuntu:xenial

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y netbase nfs-common=1:1.2.8-9ubuntu12 glusterfs-client=3.7.6-1ubuntu1 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ENTRYPOINT ["/bin/mount"]
